plot outline: Pruthvi (Pruthvi) is son of a millionaire businessman Raghunath (Raghunatha Reddy) in Chennai. He marries poor girl Sujitha (Sujitha) against the wishes of his father. Pruthvi and Sujitha reach Hyderabad and start their life afresh. In order to make fast buck, Pruthvi falls into the trap of a conman and loses hefty amount which he has taken as debt from a neighbor. He almost makes an attempt to suicide, but decides to face the reality and make an attempt to live and payback the debts. The rest of the story is all about how Pruthvi achieves his target and lives his life to the fullest.
title: Prayatnam
plot: Pruthvi (Pruthvi) is son of a millionaire businessman Raghunath (Raghunatha Reddy) in Chennai. He marries poor girl Sujitha (Sujitha) against the wishes of his father. Pruthvi and Sujitha reach Hyderabad and start their life afresh. In order to make fast buck, Pruthvi falls into the trap of a conman and loses hefty amount which he has taken as debt from a neighbor. He almost makes an attempt to suicide, but decides to face the reality and make an attempt to live and payback the debts. The rest of the story is all about how Pruthvi achieves his target and lives his life to the fullest.::M Naresh Kumar
